file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-20-05-06 - NOSE-LANDING-GEAR DOOR ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE-LANDING-GEAR DOOR ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do an inspection on the nose landing gear (NLG) doors for general condition. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 32-20-05-200-801-A NLG DOORS - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-20-05 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-05-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NLG DOORS - INSPECTION A. General (1) Use this procedure to do the inspection on the NLG doors for general condition. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task NLG wheelwell I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Make sure that the landing gear safety pin is installed on the NLG ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 32-20-05 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Inspect the doors (1) for general condition and backlash. (2) Inspect the bonding braids (2) for general condition. (3) For aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 32-20-05 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
